name: Blast Archer
description:
# [Blast Archer](https://bapharia.com/classes/6) <:earth:1133646462006345798>
*Utilizing a bow to strike down foes from a safe distance, Blast Archers also provide heals and buffs for allies and debuffs to enemies.*
### Buff Charge Gauge
> By dealing damage, Blast Archers can charge the Buff Charge Gauge up to level 3. Using the subaction, Cure Arrow, will consume the gauge and place a healing field at the selected location. The heal amount will differ based on the gauge level. The gauge will charge more when dealing critical hits and hitting enemy weak points.
### Weak-point Targeting
> Blast Archers deal increased damage when hitting an enemy’s weak point. These points vary between enemies, such as the head or back. You may be able to hit weak spots with auto aim on some enemies, but this is unlikely to be the case for most enemies so players will have to switch between auto and manual aim for maximum efficiency.
 ### Pros
- Powerful buffs and debuffs with high uptime
- Most consistent healing output
- Ranged—great for farming enemies
### Cons
- Low damage output
- Medium survivability
- Difficult animation cancels

name: Twin Striker
description:
# [Twin Striker](https://bapharia.com/classes/7) <:fire:1133646452548173907>
*With axes in each hand, Twin Strikers unleash fast combo attacks to continuously deal damage, stack buffs, and contribute many hits to the Party Chain.*
## Combo Gauge
> Twin Strikers build Combo Gauge with each successful hit. The Combo Gauge is a damage multiplier that increases the power of all their attacks. If their HP drops below a certain amount, the gauge will be reset back to 0.
 ### Pros
- Very high damage output
- Abundant self-heal and damage reduction
- High hit count for party chain
### Cons
- Low mobility
- Close range
- Few party support options

name: Spell Caster
description:
# [Spell Caster](https://bapharia.com/classes/11) <:fire:1133646452548173907><:ice:1133646458256625674><:thunder:1133646456352415875>
*With mastery over the elements, Spell Casters use a staff to decimate their enemies from afar, dealing massive burst damage and accumulating Elemental Charge.*
## EP Gauge
> Most Spell Caster skills do not have cooldowns, and instead consume EP from the EP Gauge. Different skills require different amounts of EP. EP will slowly recover over time, and can be quickly recharged by holding the subaction button.
 ### Pros
- High damage output
- High elemental charge accumulation
- Ranged—good for farming enemies
### Cons
- Very low mobility
- Low survivability
- Few non-elemental skills

name: Aegis Fighter
description:
# [Aegis Fighter](https://bapharia.com/classes/12) <:light:1133646465617641482>
*Wielding a one-handed sword and shield, Aegis Fighters battle on the front line, utilizing both offensive and defensive skills that excel in crowd-control and enemy aggro management.*
## Shield Gauge
> Aegis Fighters can hold down the class action button to enter a guard stance. Successful blocks of enemy attacks will consume Shield Gauge. Once the gauge is depleted, shield-related skills will be temporarily unavailable. Press the normal attack button after blocking to perform a powerful counterattack.
 ### Pros
- High survivability
- Strong crowd control and support abilities
- High skill ceiling
### Cons
- Low damage output
- Long cooldowns
- Short range and slow attack speed

name: Heavy Smasher
description:
# [Heavy Smasher](https://bapharia.com/classes/19) <:earth:1133646462006345798>
*Carrying a cannon-hammer hybrid weapon, Heavy Smashers perform slow, heavy-hitting attacks that deal significant damage and provide crowd-control.*
## Cartridge
> Certain Heavy Smasher skills consume ammunition from the cartridge, with different skills consuming different amounts. If there are remaining rounds in the cartridge, holding the subaction button will reload the cartridge. If the cartridge is completely empty, pressing the subaction button will initiate a Quick Reload, granting 2 extra rounds of ammunition.
 ### Pros
- Excellent enemy grouping capability
- High damage output
- High survivability
### Cons
- Slow attacks
- Reliant on Super Armor
- Few party buffs/debuffs

name: Blitz Lancer
description:
# [Blitz Lancer](https://bapharia.com/classes/20) <:thunder:1133646456352415875>
*Equipped with a spear, Blitz Lancers make use of their dynamic movement in close-combat while utilizing their unique Sigils for various buffs and debuffs.*
## Sigils
> Blitz Lancer can apply Sigils on enemies by using various skills or basic attacks. **The sigils don't do anything on their own.** They must be activated by a skill that activates (explodes) them, or by Leap Shot (class action).
## <:redsigil:1142049206832480266> Burst Sigil (炸)
> **The skill that activates a red sigil deals increased damage.** Can be applied via various tactical skills, holding basic attack until it's charged enough to do the dash attack, or with a max-height plunge attack.
## <:bluesigil:1142049208917041162> Void Sigil (虚)
> **Activating this sigil applies Decreased Attack on the enemy.** Can be applied via various tactical skills, and the forward basic attack.
## <:greensigil:1142049213191032943> Binding Sigil (絡)
> **Activating this sigil applies Reduced Movement Speed on the enemy.** Can be applied via various tactical skills, and the backward basic attack.
## Ultimate Sigil Flowerfall (重刻・散華)
> In addition to the effects above, **activating all 3 sigils at once will cause a powerful AoE explosion.**
### Pros
- High damage output and mobility
- High mobbing potential
- High skill ceiling
### Cons
- Semi-low survivability
- Complex skill rotations
- Few party buffs/debuffs
